extends Object
    Generic state cursor implementation

      • commit

        public abstract void commit()
                     throws StateException
        Commit transaction

        For cursors that have an underlying interface implementation that does not support transactions, commit is a noop.

        Throws:
        StateException

      • get

        public <T> T get(String s,
                 Class<T> cls)
          throws StateException
        Get a state value
        Parameters:
        s - State key to fetch state for
        cls - Class to deserialize state data into
        Returns:
        Returns an object containing state data for key, null if not found
        Throws:
        StateException

      • set

        public void set(String s,

        Set a state value
        Parameters:
        s - State key to store state for
        o - Object containing state data to serialize into state storage
        Throws:
        StateException
